title: Annoying black boxes in my client
body:
https://image.prntscr.com/image/Mr2mXPb_SA_wplxL7HSIIw.png
https://image.prntscr.com/image/DPqzvdp0QbWlxC6b7wGRnA.png

Can someone tell me if someone else is experiencing the same issue that I do ? 
My gpu is GTX 770 and every game is working fine without any issue, also league of legends is working fine no frame drops or anything, but the league client is so bugged out, I tried repairing it and it is still the same thing. Please fix this

replies.body: Just checking in here; did you try any of the steps that Kokua offered prior, and did they help get rid of the black boxes?

Some recommended things to do would be to [update your graphics drivers](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq1), try and repair the client either through the client or through the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool), and to check for possible [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).
